formula: Lim sup n->infinity (|a(n)|/n!)^(1/n) = 1.88681124646597... = abs(1/r), where r is the complex root of the equation log(r+1)*cos(r)*(2*sin(r) + log(r+1)*cos(r)) = -1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 02 2013
author: Patrick Demichel (patrick.demichel(AT)hp.com)
extensions: Prepended missing a(0)=0 from _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 01 2013
